description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝溥仪的淑妃，后与溥仪离婚。她是中国历史上唯一一位担任过教职的皇妃。
description.en: The Shu Fei (Consort Shu) of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, whom she later divorced. She is the only imperial consort in Chinese history to have worked as a schoolteacher.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇帝，也是中国历史上最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing Dynasty and the final emperor of China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代皇后，溥仪的嫡妻。
description.en: The last empress of the Qing Dynasty, the primary consort of Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军军官，文绣的第二任丈夫。
description.en: An officer of the National Revolutionary Army and the second husband of Wenxiu.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的父亲，满洲鄂尔德特氏，曾任内务府主事。
description.en: Father of Wenxiu, from the Manchu Erdet clan, who served as a director in the Imperial Household Department.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的祖父，官至吏部尚书。
description.en: Grandfather of Wenxiu, who served as the Minister of Personnel.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的母亲，端恭的继配。
description.en: Mother of Wenxiu and the second wife of Duangong.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的妹妹，是家族中唯一支持她与溥仪离婚的人。
description.en: Sister of Wenxiu, and the only family member who supported her divorce from Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的族兄，曾登报撰文指责她与溥仪离婚。
description.en: A male cousin of Wenxiu, who published an article in a newspaper criticizing her for divorcing Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的五叔，提议将文绣的照片送去参加选妃。
description.en: The fifth paternal uncle of Wenxiu, who suggested sending her photograph for the imperial consort selection.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治家，曾任中华民国代总统。刘振东曾是其部下。
description.en: A Chinese military general and politician who served as the acting President of the Republic of China. Liu Zhendong was one of his subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 指1931年淑妃文绣主动向法院提出与逊帝溥仪离婚并最终成功的事件。此事在当时社会引起巨大震动。
description.en: Refers to the event in 1931 where Consort Shu Wenxiu proactively filed for and successfully obtained a divorce from the deposed emperor Puyi. The incident caused a major sensation in society at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由满族建立的最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，由皇帝亲自统领的上三旗之首。文绣家族隶属于此旗。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty, the head of the Upper Three Banners directly commanded by the emperor. Wenxiu's family belonged to this banner.

description.zh-cn: 清朝管理皇室、宗室事务的机构。文绣的父亲端恭曾在此任职。
description.en: The institution in the Qing dynasty responsible for managing the affairs of the imperial household and clan. Wenxiu's father, Duangong, served in this department.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的著名中学。文绣离婚后曾在此化名傅玉芳担任国文与国画教师。
description.en: A well-known middle school in Beijing. After her divorce, Wenxiu taught Chinese literature and painting here under the alias Fu Yufang.

description.zh-cn: 文绣于1947年曾在此报社担任校对。
description.en: A newspaper where Wenxiu worked as a proofreader in 1947.

en: Beijing Si Li Dun Ben Primary School

description.zh-cn: 文绣童年时曾就读的学校。
description.en: The primary school that Wenxiu attended in her childhood.

description.zh-cn: 北京市在1928年至1949年期间的名称。文绣在此出生。
description.en: The name for Beijing between 1928 and 1949. Wenxiu was born here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。文绣在此逝世并安葬。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China. Wenxiu died and was buried here.

description.zh-cn: 律师，在文绣与溥仪的离婚案中担任溥仪的代理律师之一。
description.en: A lawyer who represented Puyi during his divorce case with Wenxiu.

description.zh-cn: 律师，在文绣与溥仪的离婚案中担任溥仪的代理律师之一。
description.en: A lawyer who represented Puyi during his divorce case with Wenxiu.

description.zh-cn: 律师，在文绣与溥仪的离婚案中担任文绣的代理律师之一。
description.en: A lawyer who represented Wenxiu during her divorce case with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 律师，在文绣与溥仪的离婚案中担任文绣的代理律师之一。
description.en: A lawyer who represented Wenxiu during her divorce case with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 律师，在文绣与溥仪的离婚案中担任文绣的代理律师之一。
description.en: A lawyer who represented Wenxiu during her divorce case with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 文绣于1922年嫁给溥仪，被册封为淑妃。两人于1931年正式离婚。
description.en: Wenxiu married Puyi in 1922 and was granted the title of Consort Shu. They officially divorced in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 1947年，文绣与国民党军官刘振东结婚，共度晚年。
description.en: In 1947, Wenxiu married Kuomintang officer Liu Zhendong, with whom she spent her later years.

description.zh-cn: 文绣因无法忍受溥仪的冷落和宫中不自由的生活，主动从天津静园出走，通过律师向溥仪提出离婚，引发了“刀妃革命”。
description.en: Unable to bear Puyi's neglect and the restrictive life in the court, Wenxiu left their residence in Tianjin and initiated divorce proceedings through lawyers, triggering the 'Knife Consort Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 在被迫同意离婚后，溥仪为挽回体面，登报发布“上谕”，宣布撤去文绣的原封位号，废为庶人。
description.en: After being forced to agree to the divorce, Puyi, in order to save face, published an 'imperial edict' in the newspapers, announcing the revocation of Wenxiu's title and demoting her to the status of a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪明显偏爱皇后婉容而冷落淑妃文绣，这导致了文绣长期的抑郁苦闷，是其最终决定离婚的重要原因之一。
description.en: Puyi's clear preference for Empress Wanrong and neglect of Consort Wenxiu led to Wenxiu's long-term depression and was a significant reason for her eventual decision to divorce.

description.zh-cn: 在文绣提出离婚后，其族兄文绮在报纸上刊登公开信，以家族名誉和清室恩典为由，指责文绣的行为“糊涂万分，荒谬万分”，劝其“耐死忍受”。
description.en: After Wenxiu filed for divorce, her cousin Wenqi published an open letter in the newspaper, condemning her actions as 'utterly muddled and absurd' based on family honor and the grace of the Qing court, urging her to 'endure until death'.

description.zh-cn: 文绣针对文绮的指责，回信进行义正辞严的反驳，强调自己作为中华民国国民，有权依据民国法律寻求平等待遇，并警告文绮其言论可能触犯法律。
description.en: In response to Wenqi's accusations, Wenxiu wrote a stern rebuttal, emphasizing her right as a citizen of the Republic of China to seek equal treatment under its laws and warning Wenqi that his statements could be illegal.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的妹妹文珊是其家族中唯一一位支持她与溥仪离婚的人。
description.en: Wenxiu's younger sister, Wenshan, was the only member of her family who supported her divorce from Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 1921年，文绣的五叔华堪提议将她的照片送入宫中参加溥仪的选妃，促成了她成为皇妃。
description.en: In 1921, Wenxiu's fifth paternal uncle, Huakan, proposed sending her photograph to the palace for Puyi's consort selection, which led to her becoming an imperial consort.

description.zh-cn: 刘振东曾是北平行营长官李宗仁部下的少校军需官。
description.en: Liu Zhendong served as a Major Quartermaster under Li Zongren, the director of the Beiping Field Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 1917年，八岁的文绣进入北京私立敦本小学读书。
description.en: In 1917, at the age of eight, Wenxiu enrolled in the Beijing Si Li Dun Ben Primary School.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的家族是蒙古八旗中的鄂尔德特氏，隶属于上三旗的镶黄旗。
description.en: Wenxiu's family, the Erdet clan of the Mongol Eight Banners, belonged to the Bordered Yellow Banner of the Upper Three Banners.

description.zh-cn: 文绣是清朝末代皇帝溥仪的淑妃。
description.en: Wenxiu was the Consort Shu of Puyi, the last emperor of the Qing Dynasty.

position.en: Teacher of Chinese Literature and Painting

description.zh-cn: 离婚后，文绣化名傅玉芳在私立四存中小学（现北京市第八中学）担任教师，后因身份暴露而辞职。
description.en: After her divorce, Wenxiu worked as a teacher at the Si Cun Private Middle School (now Beijing No. 8 Middle School) under the alias Fu Yufang, but resigned after her identity was revealed.

description.zh-cn: 1947年，文绣经人介绍在《华北日报》担任校对员。
description.en: In 1947, through an acquaintance, Wenxiu began working as a proofreader at the Huabei Daily.

description.zh-cn: 文绣的父亲端恭曾在内务府担任主事。
description.en: Wenxiu's father, Duangong, served as a director in the Imperial Household Department.

description.zh-cn: 作为文绣的代理律师，帮助其与溥仪进行离婚谈判并达成协议。
description.en: As Wenxiu's legal representative, he helped her negotiate and reach a divorce settlement with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 作为文绣的代理律师，帮助其与溥仪进行离婚谈判并达成协议。
description.en: As Wenxiu's legal representative, he helped her negotiate and reach a divorce settlement with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 作为文绣的代理律师，帮助其与溥仪进行离婚谈判并达成协议。
description.en: As Wenxiu's legal representative, he helped her negotiate and reach a divorce settlement with Puyi.

description.zh-cn: 作为溥仪的代理律师，代表溥仪方寻求庭外和解，试图维护溥仪的利益。
description.en: As Puyi's legal representative, he sought an out-of-court settlement on behalf of Puyi, attempting to protect his interests.

description.zh-cn: 作为溥仪的代理律师，代表溥仪方寻求庭外和解，试图维护溥仪的利益。
description.en: As Puyi's legal representative, he sought an out-of-court settlement on behalf of Puyi, attempting to protect his interests.
